title: [Ruins, Terrace of Runes]
description: Stained with a sticky red substance, the stone platform is covered in runes.  Terraced outer edges hold numerous racks of weaponry and armor, each level covered in chiseled symbols and markings.  A stone pillar sits at the exact center, its base wider than its top.

Racks of weapons line the edge of the platform paired with suits of armor.  The stone platform is covered in runes stained with red substance.  A stone pillar sits in the center of the platform, its base wider than its top.
